Reviews.Title: I love it very much
Reviews.Author: Wisly PROSPERE
Reviews.Content: I loveit because it's sexy and in excellent condition. It's why I give it a excellent feed back. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: If you need internet connection, please don't buy this computer
Reviews.Author: Estefanía G
Reviews.Content: I am so disappointed about Sony, I really need internet for my work and the wireless is a mess, I have changed configurations,  I have  downloaded drivers, even I called my internet provider and asked for a new router,  I have made everything recommended but nothing fixes my problem.I have tried to contact support through [...] several times, but this page just erases my email and I can't access to get assistance. The only support I received is an email telling me that I can access to this page to get support, but when I tell them that chat is not working I never received an a reply again.I have had to move my computer 3ft away from the router, but even here I lose the connection frequently and I have to turn off the wifi at least 30 times at day, with my old Sony Vaio I could work 45ft away from the router without problem, I don't know what happened with Sony but if I had known that I couldn't work with this computer I would never have bought this computer.I used to love Sony, now I hate it, I will never will buy any Sony product again.
